article.title: Raytheon Receives $24.3 Million for Production of Towed Decoys
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Raytheon Company has received a $24.3 million contract for continued production of its ALE-50 line of towed decoys. Towed decoy systems enhance aircraft survivability by acting as a preferential target for many types of missiles. The U.S. Air Force Warner Robins Air Logistics Center awarded the contract.
